title: Gold 3 Mid/ADC main LF serious team.
body:
Looking for serious team dedicated to improvement. Diligent mid/adc main with a strong focus on improvement and building synergy with peers. Looking to potentially participate in some online tournaments.

Add Novah ingame, or Failfrosty on skype for a chat

replies.body:
Try out the Quell recruitment team
They are kinda looking for a mid and adc
